column3: {IMG_TXT} Get Master Volume アイコン

column2: This action returns the master volume for the sound system. You give a target variable to return the volume value to (you can flag this as being a temporary local variable). The returned value will be between 0 and 1, where 0 is silent and 1 is full volume.

column3: {IMG_TXT} Get Master Volume アクション

column2: The target variable to store the returned volume
column3: ボリュームの返り値を入れる対象変数

column2: The above action block code checks a global variable to see if it is <tt>true</tt> or false. If it is <tt>true</tt> then the master volume for the sound system is retrieved and stored in a temporary local variable. The value is then checked to see if it is not equal to 0.5, and if it is not, then the master volume of the sound system is set to 0.5. If the global variable evaluates to <tt>false</tt>, then the master volume is set to 1.
{SEARCH_RESULT} Page that explains the Get Master Volume action
column3: {SEARCH_RESULT} Get Master Volume アクションの解説ページ
{INDEX_KEYWORD} DnD™ アクション - Get Master Volume
